main event: Two moon-like objects were observed in a V-formation over Melbourne Beach, Florida, on July 3, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were seen for approximately 4-10 minutes at 9:15 PM.,The objects moved in the same direction and speed before disappearing into clouds.,The sighting was reported to a local Air Force base and a nearby Navy base., The observer was a weather observer from Melbourne Beach, Florida., The report indicates that no photographs captured the sighting.
witness description: Observed with the naked eye, the witness was watching TV when attracted by a bright light in the sky.
